This guide is actively being developed and welcomes your input. To request a new topic or suggest edits submit a [New issue](https://github.com/tidy-MN/qualitative-guide/issues) on the development page. You can also post a question specific to your data to the [Requests for assistnace](https://teams.microsoft.com/l/channel/19%3afac52c418e5f48b48ba3fd5a3fc47140%40thread.skype/Requests%2520for%2520assistance?groupId=44cb2676-6137-4f1c-b7d0-9fbd672f9c65&tenantId=eb14b046-24c4-4519-8f26-b89c2159828c) channel in the R users Team.
